name: NSStatusBar
desc: An object that manages a collection of status items displayed within the system-wide menu bar.

items.name: system
items.desc: Returns the system-wide status bar located in the menu bar.

items.name: statusItem
items.desc: Returns a newly created status item that has been allotted a specified space within the status bar.

items.name: removeStatusItem
items.desc: Removes the specified status item from the receiver.

items.name: isVertical
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the status bar has a vertical orientation.

items.name: thickness
items.desc: The thickness of the status bar, in pixels.
